Subject: LGBTQA* - An Alphabet Soup Q&A
Description: A discussion on LGBT/Queer Culture within fandom. This includes challenges faced, successes of fandom culture, and opportunities for improving inclusivity/diversity within fandom. This will be a hands-on discussion where a diverse panel will represent a variety of the gender and sexual spectrum and audience participation will be encouraged. Our panelists will be happy to address general questions about the gender and sexual spectrum after the panel, as well as providing resources for further learning.  Speakers include:April Nance, Alexa Albright-Kelley, Julie Hargraves, James Dobbs, Hope Dundas, Maggi Rohde Idzikowski, Carol Thomas, Michael Ryan McPeek, Jennifer Copeland - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
